channel.title: How to add commands to richscape?
channel.description: hi, any1 know hot to add commands to richscape?

item.title: How to add commands to richscape?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

here example, for ::notedbarrows,

if (command.startsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(4717, 1000); addItem(4719, 1000); addItem(4721, 1000); addItem(4723, 1000); addItem(4709, 1000); addItem(4711, 1000); addItem(4713, 1000); addItem(4715, 1000); addItem(4754, 1000); addItem(4756, 1000); addItem(4758, 1000); addItem(4760, 1000); addItem(4746, 1000); addItem(4748, 1000); addItem(4750, 1000); addItem(4752, 1000); addItem(4733, 1000); addItem(4735, 1000); addItem(4737, 1000); addItem(4739, 1000); addItem(4727, 1000); addItem(4729, 1000); addItem(4731, 1000); addItem(4725, 1000);

you could add that above, ::pickup

in client.java,

Read full topic
